directions: Mix mashed avocados, lime juice, basil, garlic salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Add chicken, raisins, and walnuts to avocado mixture and stir until evenly coated. Spoon chicken mixture into lettuce leaves and roll leaves around filling.
ingredients: 2 ripe avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed
title: Basil-Avocado Chicken Salad Wraps
